description.en:
"February 10 took place on the cryptocurrency fork Taler. https://talercrypto.com/#modal    
● PoW/PoS algorithm - Lyra2z
● Issue - 23,333,333 coins
● Unit time - 1 minute
● Remuneration - 7 TLR coins
● Mining Hardware - CPU, GPU, PoS
● Difficulty adjustment - every block
● Atomic swaps
● Segwit & Lightning
● Replay protection
● Unique address format Bech32
"
